entry.title: Implore for me
entry.summary:
Author: bhangschan

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,071Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: "Do you believe in God, Mr Lee?" A voice called. Felix looked up at the silhouette who stood at the front of the sanctuary. He couldn't see much in the darkness of the church, but he was thankful to the candles that filled the church."I do." Felix spoke. He could hear his voice ring through the entire building."Do you believe he forgave you for your sins? Does he believe in you?" OR Nineteen-year-old Lee Felix's family decides to move to a Christian fundamentalist community, hoping to connect to God closer. But as Felix slowly gets the hang of his new routine, his faith slowly becomes the last thing on his mind when he meets his preacher Bang Chan.
